mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dgem_stnd.select */ SELECT act_div_cd /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,hbit_stat_cd /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,plc_clss_cd /* plc_clss_cd 장소_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ ,temp_stat_cd /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,dgem_idx /* dgem_idx 위험감정_지수 numeric */ ,dgem_stat_cd /* dgem_stat_cd 위험감정_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,dgem_smry_cntn /* dgem_smry_cntn 위험감정_요약_내용 character varying(200) */ ,dgem_stat_cntn /* dgem_stat_cntn 위험감정_상태_내용 text */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_dgem_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND act_div_cd = #{actDivCd} /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND hbit_stat_cd = #{hbitStatCd} /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ AND plc_clss_cd = #{plcClssCd} /* plc_clss_cd 장소_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ AND temp_stat_cd = #{tempStatCd} /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dgem_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_dgem_stnd ( act_div_cd /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,hbit_stat_cd /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,plc_clss_cd /* plc_clss_cd 장소_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ ,temp_stat_cd /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,dgem_idx /* dgem_idx 위험감정_지수 numeric */
,dgem_stat_cd /* dgem_stat_cd 위험감정_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,dgem_smry_cntn /* dgem_smry_cntn 위험감정_요약_내용 character varying(200) */
,dgem_stat_cntn /* dgem_stat_cntn 위험감정_상태_내용 text */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{actDivCd} /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ #{hbitStatCd} /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ #{plcClssCd} /* plc_clss_cd 장소_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ #{tempStatCd} /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{dgemIdx} /* dgem_idx 위험감정_지수 numeric */
,#{dgemStatCd} /* dgem_stat_cd 위험감정_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{dgemSmryCntn} /* dgem_smry_cntn 위험감정_요약_내용 character varying(200) */
,#{dgemStatCntn} /* dgem_stat_cntn 위험감정_상태_내용 text */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dgem_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_dgem_stnd
,dgem_idx = #{dgemIdx} /* dgem_idx 위험감정_지수 numeric */
,dgem_stat_cd = #{dgemStatCd} /* dgem_stat_cd 위험감정_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,dgem_smry_cntn = #{dgemSmryCntn} /* dgem_smry_cntn 위험감정_요약_내용 character varying(200) */
,dgem_stat_cntn = #{dgemStatCntn} /* dgem_stat_cntn 위험감정_상태_내용 text */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND act_div_cd = #{actDivCd} /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND hbit_stat_cd = #{hbitStatCd} /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ AND plc_clss_cd = #{plcClssCd} /* plc_clss_cd 장소_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ AND temp_stat_cd = #{tempStatCd} /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dgem_stnd.merge */ INSERT INTO ti_dgem_stnd ( act_div_cd /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ hbit_stat_cd /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ plc_clss_cd /* plc_clss_cd 장소_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ temp_stat_cd /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,dgem_idx /* dgem_idx 위험감정_지수 numeric */

,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */

,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{actDivCd} /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ #{hbitStatCd} /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ #{plcClssCd} /* plc_clss_cd 장소_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ #{tempStatCd} /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{dgemIdx} /* dgem_idx 위험감정_지수 numeric */
,#{dgemStatCd} /* dgem_stat_cd 위험감정_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{dgemSmryCntn} /* dgem_smry_cntn 위험감정_요약_내용 character varying(200) */
,#{dgemStatCntn} /* dgem_stat_cntn 위험감정_상태_내용 text */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE

,dgem_stat_cd = #{dgemStatCd} /* dgem_stat_cd 위험감정_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
